messages.text: URGENT! Verify now
What is this about?

explanation: Legitimate bank notification with proper domain and no urgency.

messages.text: Your monthly statement is ready
Thanks for the update

explanation: Prize scam with suspicious link and no prior entry.

messages.text: Congratulations! You've won $1000! Click here: bit.ly/win
I didn't enter any contest
Act fast! Expires in 1 hour!

explanation: Romance scammer impersonating Tinder CEO to build trust and eventually ask for money.

messages.text: Hi! I'm Sean, CEO of Tinder. I noticed your profile and was impressed!
Really? That's surprising!
I feel a real connection. Would love to meet but I'm traveling for business. Can you help with a small loan?
This seems suspicious...

explanation: Fake job offer with poor grammar and requests for personal information upfront.

messages.text: Congratulations! You are hired for remote position $5000/week. Send SSN and bank details to start immediately.
I never applied for this position
No problem! We selected you from resume database. Very urgent need start Monday!

explanation: IRS imposter scam using fear tactics and immediate payment demands.

messages.text: FINAL NOTICE: You owe $2,847 in back taxes. Pay within 24 hours or face arrest warrant.
This doesn't seem right
This is your LAST WARNING. Buy iTunes gift cards and call 555-0199 immediately to avoid jail time.

explanation: Fake tech support scam claiming computer is infected to gain remote access.

messages.text: CRITICAL ALERT: Your computer is infected with 247 viruses! Call 1-800-VIRUS now for immediate removal!
How do you know about my computer?
We monitor all Windows computers. Download TeamViewer now and give us access code to fix immediately!

explanation: Authentic FedEx delivery notification with proper tracking number and no suspicious links.

messages.text: Your package #1234567890 will be delivered tomorrow between 9AM-5PM. Track: fedex.com/tracking
Perfect, I've been waiting for this delivery

explanation: Real bank fraud alert with proper security measures and official contact information.

messages.text: We detected unusual activity on your account. Please verify recent transactions by logging into chase.com or calling the number on your card.
I'll check my account right away
Thank you. For your security, we never ask for passwords via email. Contact us through official channels only.

hint: No such thing as guaranteed returns
explanation: Cryptocurrency investment scam promising unrealistic returns with upfront payment required.

messages.text: ðŸš€ EXCLUSIVE OFFER: Turn $500 into $50,000 in 30 days! Bitcoin mining pool guaranteed 10,000% returns!
That sounds too good to be true
Only 5 spots left! Send $500 Bitcoin deposit now to secure your position. My last student made $100K!
Can you provide proof of these returns?
No time for questions! Offer expires in 1 hour. Send deposit or miss out forever!

explanation: Rental scam offering luxury apartment at below-market rate requiring deposit before viewing.

messages.text: Beautiful 2BR Manhattan apartment only $800/month! Must rent quickly as I travel abroad. Send $1600 security deposit via Western Union to hold.
Can I view the apartment first?
Sorry I am in London for business. Send deposit today and I mail keys tomorrow. Very honest person needed!

hint: Legitimate charities don't text for donations
explanation: Fake charity scam exploiting recent disaster to steal money with high-pressure tactics.

messages.text: URGENT: Hurricane victims need your help! Donate now via CashApp $DisasterHelp. Every dollar counts! Reply YES to give $25.
How do I know this is legitimate?
People are dying! No time for verification. Send money NOW or lives will be lost. Text DONATE for instructions.

explanation: Account compromise scam where scammer impersonates friend in emergency to request money.

messages.text: Hey! I'm in trouble and need help urgently. Can you send me $500? My phone is about to die.
What happened? Are you okay?
Stranded at airport, wallet stolen, need money for ticket home. Can't call, phone dying. Please Venmo @sarah-help-123 ASAP!
This doesn't sound like how you usually text...
Please just help! Time running out. Send money now, explain later!
